4.6.1.3. util.encodeQueryElement¶

util.encodeQueryElement(element)¶

Encodes a URL query element according to RFC3986.

Parameters:
  • element (Unicode) – The query element to encode for transmission in a URL.
Returns:

URL encoded query element
Return type:

UTF-8 encoded string.
